Here are some of my data projects and tools.

**[Resume:](resume.qmd)**
My resume and longer CV, with links to downloadable PDFs.

**[tidyusmacro:](tidyusmacro.qmd)**
An R package providing utilities to retrieve and tidy U.S. macroeconomic data series from public government data providers.

**[Inflation Distribution:](inflation_distribution.qmd)**
A tool to visualize the distribution of price inflation for CPI and PCE, with seasonally-adjusted and annualized values.

**[Completed Fertility Visualizer:](completed_fertility.qmd)**
An interactive tool for exploring trends in completed fertility data.
